long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Clearing the Oceans, one search at a time

Replace your usual search engine with Surf Clear and for every 10 searches we will remove one plastic bottle from the Ocean.

Unlike other search engines, we use the advertising revenue generated by your searches to cover our basic running costs and donate 100% of the remainder to charity. We are committed to transparency and publish full financial reports each month so that you can see where the money is being spent and which charities are benefiting.
